name: The Adventures of Hoverslug
description:
The Adventures of Hoverslug was a small game I built back in 2015 during my last month of college.  It's a small, quirky puzzle games with a few secrets to discover and a lot of character.  Though I've made plenty of games since, this one will always hold a place in my heart.  My focus in this project was to create a rich, diegetic UI that would not require a static overlay on the screen for any portion of the game.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

E to bring UI closer to camera

Space to advance between levels or click the buttons.

?? - Secret command??
